title: 2021 Political Outlook, Father James Martin
itunes:title: 2021 Political Outlook, Father James Martin
description:
Guests: Wendy Benjaminson, Bloomberg Politics Editor, Kevin Walling, Democratic strategist at HG Creative Media, Francesca Chambers, White House Correspondent for McClatchy, Anna Edgerton, Bloomberg Politics Editor, and Father James Martin, author of "Learning to Pray" and "Jesus: A Pilgrimage."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
